text: Curuapira tuberosa is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Galileo and Martins in 2003. It is found in the country of Brazil.BioLib.cz - Curuapira tuberosa. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 2003
title: Curuapira tuberosa
